description.value:
You used to be a con artist. Those days are pretty much behind you. Being a hero is an even better racket. After all, if youâ€™re saving the world, who can be mad at you for stealing a couple of coins along the way?

Benefit:

Drawback: When you meet an NPC for the first time, the Director can award the party a Hero Token. If they do so, the NPC was a victim of one of your previous cons and remembers you.
